long_description: The Thule Pack 'n Pedal Seat Bag is an under-seat bag with a smart tool wrap to keep your tools organized and easy to get when you need them. The Thule Pack 'n Pedal Seat Bag fits virtually any seat. Easy under-seat fitting. Internal tool wrap keeps everything organized. Room for spare tube, favorite tools and CO2 cartridges. Zipperless design makes for silent riding.
short_description: The Thule Pack 'n Pedal Seat Bag is an under-seat bag with a smart tool wrap to keep your tools organized and easy to get when you need them.
